title: 1.12.2点券插件 PlayerPoints 的报错问题
author: EAT工作室
txt_content:
本帖最后由 EAT工作室 于 2019-4-7 10:17 编辑 
在使用1.12.2群组服的时候偶尔会出现报错，点卷同步了能用，就是会出现报错，求大佬们解决一下核心:paper-1606
版本:1.12.2
服务器用的都是SQilbray-7.1和playerpoints-2.1.5
点卷确定同步了还能用，就是会报错

[09:28:54] [Server thread/ERROR]: [PlayerPoints] Could not create getter statement.
com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: The last packet successfully received from the server was 49,510,633 milliseconds ago.  The last packet sent successfully to the server was 49,510,633 milliseconds ago. is longer than the server configured value of 'wait_timeout'. You should consider either expiring and/or testing connection validity before use in your application, increasing the server configured values for client timeouts, or using the Connector/J connection property 'autoReconnect=true' to avoid this problem.

replies.author: fyxrim
replies.txt_content:
EAT工作室 发表于 2019-4-7 17:12
1.9以上的核心重要报错会显示红色，红色屏蔽不了
我是说意思 
你这个指令能使用吗 能给点券别人吗 

如果可以使用 可以无视报错 没影响的

replies.author: fyxrim
replies.txt_content:
能正常使用的话，
不管报错 也可以屏蔽后台记录
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-598149-1-1.html

replies.author: EAT工作室
replies.txt_content:
fyxrim 发表于 2019-4-7 11:16
能正常使用的话，
不管报错 也可以屏蔽后台记录
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-598149-1-1.html ...
1.9以上的核心重要报错会显示红色，红色屏蔽不了

replies.author: 至尊到来
replies.txt_content: 是不是插件版本不兼容

replies.author: 九
